share on x me marie ellison. jun 10 at 5:28 pm so sorry to learn of the passing of earl! wonderful man always laughing and a great human being!! god has welcomed into heaven another angel!!! prayers for the family!!! mrs. john ellison1 comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x ds darlene stapleton. jun 10 at 5:21 pm pat i am so sorry for your loss... you are in my thoughts and prayers... comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x hh helen (spradlin) haas. jun 10 at 1:49 pm so sorry for your loss. i remember earl from school. always a smile......... comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x gregory king. jun 10 at 11:00 am you will be well missed! you always had a smile for me. enjoyed having you in my life! r. i. p my friend! greg king. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... graveside memorial service. jun 13. 1:00 pm westview cemetery. jefferson city, tn, usget order flowers now for earl's graveside memorial service no medias to show. 365 days of grief support. subscribe farrar funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
